select_language_description: Choose your preferred language to continue
left_heading: The Smarter Way to Guest Spot
left_description: Guestly connects traveling tattoo artists with top studios fast. Skip the DMs and simplify your bookings with verified profiles, real-time calendars, and easy portfolio sharing. It's guesting, upgraded.
right_otp_message: We'll call or text you to confirm your number. Standard message and data rates apply.
forgot_password_message: Enter your email address and we will send you a 4-digit code to reset your password.
otp_message: Please enter the four digit OTP code we sent to your registered email address.
set_password_message: Your new password must be different from previous passwords.
modal_password_message: Your password has been changed successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
you_subscribed_message_free: Your Free Tier subscription is now active. You can start with basic features. Upgrade anytime to unlock more!
you_subscribed_message_paid: Your Paid Tier subscription is now active. You are all set to use its amazing features.
